dmca.title: [ABUSE] LEGAL NOTICE (DMCA) FROM APPLE COMPUTER
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 27, 2005 1:41 PM
To: piracy@apple.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] LEGAL NOTICE (DMCA) FROM APPLE COMPUTER

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Piracy <piracy@apple.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Wednesday, January 26, 2005, 11:44:38 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] LEGAL NOTICE (DMCA) FROM APPLE COMPUTER

===8<==============Original message text===============
***Privileged & Confidential***
- --Not for Posting or Redistribution--

January 26, 2005

VIA EMAIL

ThePlanet.com
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 100
Dallas, TX  75207

Dear Copyright Agent:

It has been brought to our attention that ThePlanet.com ("ThePlanet") is
hosting Apple Computer, Inc. copyrighted material on its servers.

Therefore, pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (
